fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Fly around the Town, learning all whispers that are sent for the rest of the day. 3 uses.
- Use your fire abilities to burn a player, dealing an Unstoppable attack.
- Summon a sphere of energy, dealing a rampage Basic attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The Chosen One (3782) will always spawn.
- Your kills appear as "killed by a stick figure."
- Twice per game, you may make your attacks astral. The cause of death changes to "killed by a ViraBot."

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Bring the internet to its knees with your army of ViraBots.
